If a project is closed, a ResourceException is thrown when trying to remove markers from resources.

org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ResourceException: Resource '/TestJpaWeb' is not open.
at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Project.checkAccessible(Project.java:116)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Resource.findMarkers(Resource.java:858)
at org.eclipse.jpt.core.internal.validation.JpaValidator$DeleteMarkersJob.run(JpaValidator.java:140)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)

Markers should probably not be deleted when project is closed or deleted.  They should probably only be deleted when facet is removed, as that is the only place where remaining JPA markers would cause a problem.
